$type

$type : string

The field type.

Type

string

Tags

None found

$attribs

$attribs : array

HTML attributes for the field as key-value pairs. The key is the attribute name and the value is the attribute value.

Type

array

Tags

None found

$options

$options : array

Options for the field as key-value pairs (typically for select and radio elements). The key is the option value and the value is the option label. Nested options may be honored as the key being an optgroup label and the array value as the options under that optgroup.

Type

array

Tags

None found

$value

$value : mixed

The value for the field. This may or may not be the same as the 'value' attribue.

Type

mixed

Tags

None found

setOptions()

setOptions(array $options) : self

Sets the value options for this field, typically for select and radios.

Parameters

array $options

Options for the field as key-value pairs. The key is the option value and the value is the option label. Nested options may be honored as the key being an optgroup label and the array value as the options under that optgroup.

Returns

self
